content: Blockchain And Crypto Funds Conference | 22 September 2023 | Limassol, CyprusEvent Website: https://www.g4f-conference.com.cy/The only conference in the world purely focused on blockchain funds, not projects.Regional coverage: Central and Eastern Europe, Middle East, and Africa.Targeted group: Family Offices, Wealth Managers, Bankers, High Net Worth Individuals, and Accredited Individual Investors.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: Blockchain And Crypto Funds Conference to Take Place in Cyprus on September 22 https://bitcoingarden.org/blockchain-and-crypto-funds-conference-to-take-place-in-cyprus-on-september-22/ The first and only global conference focused on blockchain, and crypto funds is going to take place on 22 September in Limassol, Cyprus, Europe. No crypto projects will be presenting.The conference will welcome about 200 participants, mainly investment professionals, Family Offices, Wealth Managers, Bankers, High Net Worth Individuals, and Accredited Individual Investors. They will come primarily from regions of Central and Eastern Europe, Middle East and Africa.What can be expected? The high-class venue, a lot of networking, top-notch speakers and global blockchain field experts. Donâ€™t miss this opportunity....

comments.author: beila688
comments.body: Can the blockchain still do it?

comments.author: Framelover
comments.body: The Blockchain and Crypto Funds Conference is a specialized one-day event happening on Sept22, 2023 in Limassol, Cyprus. Its major focus is on blockchain funds and the target audience includes family offices, wealth managers, bankers, high net worth individuals, and accredited individual investors from Central and Eastern Europe, Middle East, and Africa.
